thread.title: `Married` Mickey Rooney had affair with Elizabeth Taylor
thread.title_full: `Married` Mickey Rooney had affair with Elizabeth Taylor

author: NewsWire
title: `Married` Mickey Rooney had affair with Elizabeth Taylor
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
London, Oct. 11 (ANI): If the new biography is to be believed, then Mickey Rooney, in his mid-20s, had an affair with Elizabeth Taylor when she was just 14. 
According to a new biography ‘In The Life and Times of Mickey Rooney,’ the late actor’s second wife Betty Jane found the actor in a compromising position with the Taylor, which led to their divorce, The Daily Mail reports. 
A source revealed that Jane had gone to visit her husband at a studio in Los Angeles, where she found him with Taylor. 
Taylor and Rooney had starred together in ‘National Velvet’ in 1944. (ANI) Related Posts
